message: So we're doing TNT early on Friday (12 Pacific) so we can catch our flights to Austin. And we're doing live coverage on TWiT three hours later of the iPad launch at the Austin 'popup' store. Since most of what we'd say about the iPad launch would be dated by later that evening, should we just not tsalk about iPad stuff until the Sunday show?

Most of your audience probably wouldn't mind the delay in iPad2 talk. Maybe Canadians would like to hear a bit more about the launch given we have to wait until the 25th? Not that I will be running out and getting a new iPad in two weeks. Just a thought. Cheers.
@tommerritt Sounds like a plan.
Will there be any other news on Friday lol
It's easier to star via the app
@tommerritt I bet it would be pretty hard to not talk about iPad :)
I agree
@tommerritt If possible, but if the news is slow, then obviously you can throw in some iPad to put in some content
All Xoom all the time? A.k.a. "Spit take Friday"
Yep released yesterday
@ericflo awesome
Thanks @ToddNemeth
I agree. do this
Lol, you gotta love the speed of merritt tech support "How do i get rid of the ding?" 2 secs later there is a picture *g*
This is a chat room, people!
I dont mind, only if you guys have an actual ipad 2 with you though, otherwise its nothing really new
Hello there
@tommerritt Yeah, don't talk about the Ipad2 - talk about your Xoom instead ;-)
We have an iPhone app now
Heh, when I mentioned Xoom on twitter, I immediately got robot spam for the Xoom!
@ericflo just installed
I think you should have to drink anytime someone says iPad
When will the Android 3.0 Convore app be coming? Too bad about the Xoom spam on the Twitter
I agree with @tommerritt covers are lame in general
@ericflo posting this from the app. Sweet
I'm on a plane right now :)
/agree
I demand 24hr iPad 2 coverage!
Your SXSW Coverage should be sans iPad - i want pure sxsw coverage
Real time and archived if you aren't live.
this is a chat room!
Yes Tom.  Get the leather cover.
II think what you are thinking about doing is a great way to go about it @tommerritt Big news and such would be ok and a mention of what is happening later in the day.
@ericflo is it ipad-friendly? or do i just have to 2x blow it up?
yes I realize I can open more than one tab, I was just a little excited about the iphone app

now I can be in two rooms at the same time woot
And don't talk about SXSW either.
Sounds like a winner! Talk about Sheen instead
Btw yes, I vote for less Ipad - there is too much of it - its just some hardware toy, its not that revolutionary (even though it is a tech channel)
Discussing the iPad going on sale and the "popup" store is news and should be mentioned, but rehashing pros and cons or revolutionary vs evolutionary not so much.....
I think the iPad is a good product in that Apple way (locked down). I may buy my parents one but it's not the world changing product everyone is touting it to be.

yes for sure because im not a big apple fan boy like some i think there products are ace but for some reason ill never buy there products maybe one day but as for google I love them and would support anything they did thats with in reason.
